Headline: #63W West 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd/Harlem
ShortDescription: 63W West 63rd buses temp. rerouted WB: 63rd, Oak Park, 65th, Harlem and 63rd; EB: 63rd, Harlem, 65th, Oak Park and 63rd due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 63rd/Harlem, due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via 63rd, Oak Park, 65th, Harlem and 63rd.

Eastbound buses will operate via 63rd, Harlem, 65th, Oak Park and 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/Wabash

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
